definitions.body: old Canaanite city, LXX Odollam, with king Jos 12:15 (D), in the [[שְׁפֵלָה]] Jos 15:35 (P; LXXL Adalam ), cf. Mic 1:15, Ne 11:30; (re-)built by Rehod. acc. to 2Ch 11:17 (Odolam); [[מְעָרֵת]] ´[[ע]] (rd. [[מְחֻדַת]], [[מְחָדַת]], v. [[מְעָרָה]] sub I. [[ערר]]) 1Sa 22:1, 2Sa 23:13, 1Ch 11:15; site prob. I‘d-el-Mîye ( 'Aid el-Ma), c. 13 miles WSW. from Bethlehem,
